Metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17969 affecting package p7zip for versions less than 16.02-23
Metadata.Description: CVE-2017-17969 affecting package p7zip for versions less than 16.02-23. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package p7zip is earlier than 16.02-23, affected by CVE-2017-17969
